info.name: Admin Sponsorship Management
info.description: Admin API endpoints for sponsorship setup and package management

request.description: Get sponsorship setup details with all packages for a specific event

body.raw:
{
  "event_id": 1,
  "is_active": true,
  "packages": [
    {
      "package_name": "Bronze Sponsor",
      "is_premium": false,
      "price": 5000,
      "max_slots": 10,
      "benefits": [
        "Logo on event website",
        "Social media mention",
        "2 complimentary passes"
      ],
      "description": "Entry level sponsorship package with basic benefits",
      "is_active": true

    {
      "package_name": "Silver Sponsor",
      "is_premium": false,
      "price": 15000,
      "max_slots": 7,
      "benefits": [
        "Logo on event website",

        "Social media promotion",
        "5 complimentary passes",

      ],

      "is_active": true

    {
      "package_name": "Gold Sponsor",
      "is_premium": true,
      "price": 35000,
      "max_slots": 5,

        "Premium logo placement on all materials",

}

request.description: Create or update sponsorship setup and its packages in one API call. If packages have 'id', they will be updated; otherwise, new packages will be created. The setup is automatically created/updated based on event_id.

body.raw:
{
  "event_id": 1,
  "is_active": true,
  "packages": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "package_name": "Bronze Sponsor - Updated",
      "is_premium": false,
      "price": 6000,
      "max_slots": 12,
      "benefits": [
        "Logo on event website",
        "Social media mention",
        "3 complimentary passes",
        "Email campaign inclusion"
      ],
      "description": "Updated entry level sponsorship with additional benefits",
      "is_active": true
    },
    {
      "package_name": "Diamond Sponsor",
      "is_premium": true,
      "price": 100000,
      "max_slots": 1,
      "benefits": [
        "Exclusive title sponsor",
        "Keynote opening slot",
        "Premium booth (40x40)",
        "30 VIP passes",
        "Full event co-branding",
        "Exclusive pre-event reception",
        "Dedicated PR campaign"
      ],
      "description": "Ultimate exclusive sponsorship package",
      "is_active": true
    }
  ]
}

request.description: Update existing setup and mix update/create packages. Include 'id' in package object to update existing one, omit 'id' to create new package.
Upload or replace brochure for sponsorship setup. This will replace any existing brochure.

formdata.description: Send 'null' as string to remove brochure

request.description: Remove brochure from sponsorship setup. Send brochure='null' as text to delete the file.
Delete a sponsorship package. Cannot delete if there are existing purchases for this package.
